variables.name: MAGENTO_BACKEND_URL
variables.desc: Connect to an instance of Magento 2.3 by specifying its public domain name.

variables.name: MAGENTO_BACKEND_EDITION
variables.desc: Specify the edition of the magento store (Enterprise Edition or Community Edition). Can be one of CE or EE.

variables.name: STORE_VIEW_CODE
variables.desc: Specify the Magento store view code set in Stores > Settings > All Stores > Store View name

variables.name: USE_STORE_CODE_IN_URL
variables.desc: Includes the store code in the store URLs if value is true.

variables.name: IMAGE_OPTIMIZING_ORIGIN
variables.desc: Specify the origin to use for images in the UI. Set to `backend` when Fastly or another CDN is optimizing images, and the frontend will load images directly from the Magento instance at MAGENTO_BACKEND_URL. To force usage of the onboard image optimizer, set to `onboard`. Set to `auto` to autodetect whether the backend is using FastlyIO and optimize onboard only if it needs to.

variables.name: CUSTOM_ORIGIN_ENABLED
variables.desc: Get or create a secure, unique hostname/port combination and a trusted SSL certificate for local development.

variables.name: CUSTOM_ORIGIN_ADD_UNIQUE_HASH
variables.desc: Add a unique hash string to the custom origin, based on filesystem location. This naturally separates domains when running multiple project folders on one developer machine.

variables.name: CUSTOM_ORIGIN_SUBDOMAIN
variables.desc: Specify the subdomain prefix of the custom origin manually, instead of using the package name.

variables.name: CUSTOM_ORIGIN_EXACT_DOMAIN
variables.desc: Specify the exact domain of the custom origin manually.

variables.name: DEV_SERVER_HOST
variables.desc: Specify the hostname the dev server should bind to. If this is set, it overrides the host chosen by custom origin settings.

variables.name: DEV_SERVER_PORT
variables.desc: Specify the port the dev server should bind to. If this is set, it overrides the port chosen by custom origin settings.

variables.name: DEV_SERVER_SERVICE_WORKER_ENABLED
variables.desc: Use a service worker in developer mode (PWADevServer), which are disabled in dev mode normally to simplify cache. Good for debugging.

variables.name: DEV_SERVER_WATCH_OPTIONS_USE_POLLING
variables.desc: Set to a number greater than 0 to denote a polling interval in milliseconds. If this is greater than 0, the dev server will use filesystem polling instead of native filesystem events to watch for changes. Can increase CPU usage, but sometimes is the best option for exotic filesystems (e.g. NFS).

variables.name: STAGING_SERVER_HOST
variables.desc: Specify the hostname the staging server should bind to. If this is set, it overrides the host chosen by custom origin settings.

variables.name: STAGING_SERVER_PORT
variables.desc: Specify the port the staging server should bind to. If this is set, it overrides the port chosen by custom origin settings.

variables.name: STAGING_BUILD_ID
variables.desc: Specify the id which Buildpack will put in a comment above all generated bundle files and the index.html file

variables.name: IMAGE_SERVICE_CACHE_EXPIRES
variables.desc: Lifetime of images in the local cache of resized images. Format is "[length] [unit]", as in "10 minutes" or "1 day".

variables.name: IMAGE_SERVICE_CACHE_DEBUG
variables.desc: Log image cache debug info to the console.

variables.name: UPWARD_JS_UPWARD_PATH
variables.desc: UPWARD configuration file to use for the PWADevServer and the "stage:venia" sample server.

variables.name: UPWARD_JS_BIND_LOCAL
variables.desc: Upon launching the staging server, automatically attach to a local port and listen.

variables.name: UPWARD_JS_LOG_URL
variables.desc: Log the bound URL to stdout once the sever is listening. Useful in testing and discovery scenarios, but may be disabled in production.

variables.name: CHECKOUT_BRAINTREE_TOKEN
variables.desc: Specify a Braintree API token to direct the Venia storefront to communicate with your Braintree instance. You can find this value in Braintree's Control Panel under Settings > API Keys > Tokenization Keys.

variables.name: BUILDBUS_DEPS_ADDITIONAL
variables.desc: A list of resolvable NPM modules that BuildBus will scan for targets, in addition to those declared in project `dependencies` and `devDependencies`.

variables.name: ENABLE_EXPRESS_SERVER_COMPRESSION
variables.desc: Specify if express server compression needs to be enabled. Defaults to false if not provided.
